TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TheoryAttribute extends NUnit.Framework.NUnitAttribute

Docs.summary: Adding this attribute to a method within a class makes the method callable from the NUnit test runner. There is a property called Description which is optional which you can provide a more detailed test description. This class cannot be inherited.
